name: Home (itch) (noahm1216, Cetacean)
description:
On the journey to look for Mom, Baby Water goes through a bizarre journey that goes deeper into the Earth. Help Baby Water pass Level 1 by retrieving 3 fragments of the key to ring the bell and open the door. Tips: the fragments are located at places only a closer look would show.

Goal: Collect the 3 pieces of the key, and ring the final bell to complete the game.

Controls: AWD or Arrows - move / jump.

F - shrink.

R - restart.

Credit:
